text: The current flag of Myanmar (also known as Burma) was adopted on 21 October 2010 to replace the former flag in use since 1974. == Appearance == It has a horizontal bands of yellow, green and red; charged with a large white five- pointed star at the centre. ==Historic flags== Image:Golden Hintar flag of Burma.svg|Flag used in the Hanthawaddy Kingdom (c.1300–1500) Image:Flag of the Alaungpaya Dynasty of Myanmar.svg|Flag of the Third Burmese Empire under the Konbaung dynasty (1752–1885) Image:British Raj Red Ensign.svg|Flag of British Burma as a part of British India (1824–1937) Image:British Burma 1937 flag.svg|Flag of British Burma as a separate colony (1939–1941, 1945 – January 3, 1948) Image:Flag of Burma (1941–1942).svg|Flag of British Burma (1941–1942) Image:Merchant flag of Japan (1870).svg|Provisional flag used during the Japanese Occupation (1942–1943) Image:Flag of the State of Burma (1943-45).svg|Flag of the State of Burma (1943–1945) Image:Flag of the State of Burma (Stylized version).svg|Simplified flag of the State of Burma (1945) Image:Civil Ensign of Burma (1952-1974).svg|Former Civil Ensign of the Union of Burma (1952–1974) Image:Civil Ensign of Myanmar (1974-2010).svg|Former Civil Ensign of the Union of Burma (1974–2010) == Other websites == * Myanmar Category:Myanmar Category:2010 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in Myanmar
title: Flag of Myanmar
